senses.sense_definition: A husband, wife, or romantic partner, especially one who is supportive and helpful.

examples.text: She introduced him as her loving <w>helpmate</w> of twenty years.
The host was a quiet man who relied on his active <w>helpmate</w> to manage the guests.

senses.sense_definition: A person who provides assistance, support, or companionship.

examples.text: He proved to be a valuable <w>helpmate</w> during the difficult research project.
Every leader needs a reliable <w>helpmate</w> to handle the complex details of the job.

senses.sense_definition: A recreational chess problem in which both sides cooperate to checkmate the black king.

examples.text: The grandmaster composed a challenging <w>helpmate</w> in two moves for the competition.
Solving a <w>helpmate</w> requires thinking about cooperation rather than defense.
